title: (x) Cargo Magazine logotype - Alpha Headline {Karl}
content:
This looks familiar to me, but I can't place it. Any help?   
   
Thanks in advance!   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430002246im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37333.gif)
author: jcroft

comments.content:
alpha headline from lineto   
no longer available.

[Carplates Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430002246/http:/www.fontworks2.type.co.uk/fw/shop/catalog?action=zoom&rt=007062000&x=0&y=0&s=sf%3A*%3Bqa%3Afont%2CACME%3Bf%3A*%3Bp%3A0%3Bq%3AbyCatSubCat%3B) is similar, but it's hard to tell exactly how similar from the limited showing online.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430002246im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37345.gif)   
   
Very similar. Carplates is in RED transparency.

It doesn't happen very often yves, though I did just get a new dual 1.8 G5 here at work so that will probably trim .1 seconds off my ID times. The biggest obstacle between forum users and sub one minute IDs remains the stubborn typophile backend.   
   
And BTW, a one minute ID doesn't make anyone look bad with the possible exception of myself. I mean, what kind of loser sits at his computer attempting to ID type samples in under 60 seconds on a message board. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430002246im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
j/k.

> * * *
> \<!-quote-!\> **quote:**
> 
> I mean, what kind of loser sits at his computer attempting to ID type samples in under 60 seconds on a message board.\<!-/quote-!\>
> 
> * * *

![.](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430002246im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/37357.gif)

Karl, could you please lay off the 1-minute IDs.   
You're making the rest of us look bad... ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430002246im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
